item.title: Probe Heat Lights (EXCEPT CAPT AND F/O PITOT) – PITOT PROBE HEAT LIGHTS

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated probe heater is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – Pitot Probe Heater Systems.

placard.para: Placard appropriate Heat Light "INOP" and center item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
